verses.roman:
sei vipra mahāprabhura baḍa bhakta haila
cāri māsa prabhu-saṅga kabhu nā chāḍila

synonyms: sei vipra—that brāhmaṇa; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; baḍa—big; bhakta—devotee; haila—became; cāri māsa—for four months; prabhu-saṅga—association of the Lord; kabhu—at any time; nā—did not; chāḍila—give up.
translation: That brāhmaṇa became a great devotee of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, and for four continuous months he did not give up the Lord's company.
